questions.description: A classic opening question to introduce yourself professionally
Highlight your key professional strengths and abilities

questions.text: Describe a challenging situation you faced and how you handled it
questions.description: Demonstrate problem-solving and resilience through a specific example

questions.text: Why are you interested in this position?
questions.description: Express your interest and alignment with the role

questions.text: Where do you see yourself in five years?
questions.description: Share your professional aspirations and career trajectory
Explain the conditions where you perform your best work

questions.text: Tell me about a time you worked in a team
questions.description: Showcase your collaboration and teamwork skills

questions.text: What motivates you in your work?
questions.description: Share what drives your professional performance and satisfaction
